description: [``botocore``] You can now create cost categories with inherited value rules and specify default values for any uncategorized costs.
[``botocore``] Updated maximum allowed size of action parameter from 64 to 1024
[``botocore``] Removed APIs to control AQUA on clusters.
[``botocore``] Documentation updates for IAM operations and descriptions.
[``botocore``] GameLift adds support for using event notifications to monitor game session placements. Specify an SNS topic or use CloudWatch Events to track activity for a game session queue.
